Definitely one of my favorite games ever after just the first playthrough, absolutely love this game. The puzzles, story bits, humor, landscape, physics, it's all perfect. 2nd game is great so far too but a different beast alltogether.

A work of art, artwork,[1] art piece, piece of art or art object is an artistic creation of aesthetic value. Except for "work of art", which may be used of any work regarded as art in its widest sense, including works from literature and music, these terms apply principally to tangible, physical forms of visual art:

    An example of fine art, such as a painting or sculpture or the videogame Portal.
    An object that has been designed specifically for its aesthetic appeal, such as a piece of jewellery.
    An object that has been designed for aesthetic appeal as well as functional purpose, as in interior design and much folk art.
    An object created for principally or entirely functional, religious or other non-aesthetic reasons which has come to be appreciated as art (often later, or by cultural outsiders).
    A non-ephemeral photograph or film.
    A work of installation art or conceptual art.

Used more broadly, the term is less commonly applied to:

    A fine work of architecture or landscape design
    A production of live performance, such as theater, ballet, opera, performance art, musical concert and other performing arts, and other ephemeral, non-tangible creations.

Very swag. I wish there was more in this game but portal 2 is there for a reason.

BEST GAME EVER!

Why?
1. Gameplay: even though this game was released in 2007, the gameplay is still unique. It's not a regular FPS, or something really hard. You have to think about the puzzles, and you have to solve them.
2. Story: it's not a story like "hey, we have a story, see? now kill every mobs in this place" - it really affects the gameplay (mainly at the end). Even though our main character doesn't speak at all, and we have only one "person" among her, it's cool. GLaDOS is the best villain ever.
3. Sequel: the sequel has also a lot of cool gameplay stuff, a great story (with more characters) and a co-op mode.
4. Community: mods, new games - mainly for Portal 2, but still, this game has a great community.

I recommend this game and also the sequel - if you wait for a sale, you can get both games under 2â‚¬, it's really a bargain.
If it's your first time with Portal, you'll probably spend at least 10 hours with it. Don't spoil the puzzles for yourself.

This is a classic game for a great price. It's not long can be beat in 1 day. It's a neat little gem of a game even if its sequel does it all better but there is no good reason you shouldn't play and beat this game. Besides you can always learn to speedrun it because of how short it is.
